title: @RiotGames your Bilgewater Event
body:
Yo.  Its only a day into the event,  so don't take everything that I'm about to say too heavily.  

it LOOKS like you guys nailed this one.  we're talking out of the park, here, actually, not just a home run. 

Here's why:  

I'm new, this will be my first full season that  i have played from one worlds tournament to another. Your inclusion of an FAQ during your Client Bilgewater experience was a friggin godsend for me. 

Thank you. 

Your microsite for the bilgewater event is a few far strides above the sion release site, and the shurima microsite.  

I friggin love the choose a path feature for the summoner icons, and the fact that my interaction with this sire started in-client. That's by far the best part about it so far.  everything started from the client, I didn't have to dig through the web to find information on what was happening in the game (or from the game devs).  

And,  since I am throwing in two cents,  I just wanted to point out that i've seen the small things you guys have done this season as a direct result of queries from riot games players (veigar ult now scaling with AP,  addressing item blanace in 5.14 patch notes, etc) and say that I appreciated them.  

Now,  though, I return to play, and I return to play fully stoked about it.  

Peace.

replies.body: Thanks for the note! We've been learning a lot from past events and we aim to iterate with each one we do. Thanks for playing and keep the feedback coming!
Will there be a chance of getting all icons?
Sorry! Part of the experience is making a deliberate choice per ACT. So, you can get one per act. :(
May I ask why you chose to do it this way? Not that it's a problem for me, I'm working towards my TF icon and I'm fine, I'm just curious :)
So, if we choose TF, are we stuck with him for the event or can we choose a different one per stage?
Saw in another post that each act has it's own choice. So if you picked Graves you are not stuck with him in act 2.
It's great.  New ARAM better than old ARAM, too! Hope they keep :D
